At a recent @GUPolitics event with @MoElleithee I called for more bipartisanship in our politics. “You’re not going anywhere. I’m not going anywhere. For the rest our lives, we’re going to share this country.” #GUPolitics #RUBIOATGU

“The piece looks wildly desperate.” —@axios https://twitter.com/jessecharleslee/status/1048008662948700171 QT @JesseCharlesLee Kavanaugh’s disingenuous oped, aimed deliberately at wobbly Republicans and not the Democrats he smeared, is a perfect example of his core character flaw: he will say anything & tell any lie if he thinks it will advance his career as a political operative: https://www.americanprogress.org/issues/courts/news/2018/09/21/458457/kavanaughs-credibility-chasm/ https://twitter.com/theplumlinegs/status/1048007044513636353
"This was NOT a search for the truth. Instead, this was about politics and raw power to push through an unfit nominee."

This should have been a search for the truth. The FBI should have been allowed to do their job. Instead, the White House did not allow it. This was about politics and raw power to push through an unfit nominee.
NOW: Speaking on the floor about the nomination of Brett Kavanaugh for #SCOTUS. Watch here: https://www.senate.gov/floor/index.htm

Unemployment drops to 3.7%, the lowest rate since 1969 — the year before I was born. Tax cuts and repealing job-killing regs are producing real RESULTS. #GoodForTexas https://www.pbs.org/newshour/economy/making-sense/the-unemployment-rate-is-the-lowest-its-been-since-1969-heres-why

RT @sfpelosi Nancy Pelosi: “Let us thank Dr. Christine Blasey Ford and survivors for their strength, courage and character. What a sharp contrast to the tirade Kavanaugh presented. RT @kimguilfoyle “Guilfoyle came out guns blazing: “We’re here to make sure you don’t put a Beto male in the U.S. Senate!”she declared to delirious applause. “Let me tell you, from a real Hispanic, that Texas deserves better than what Beto O’Rourke is selling.” https://www.texasmonthly.com/politics/donald-trump-jr-comes-to-texas-to-stump-for-dads-old-rival-ted-cruz/
Silence speaks volumes. We will convert our outrage to votes — and our votes into change in 32 days.

I'm praying that conscience will prevail over politics. #BelieveSurvivors http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1048220366865412096/pu/img/S2RccJabR1r0uu8q.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1048220366865412096/pu/vid/320x180/kythCkxjtBMm3nJt.mp4?tag=5

The founders created the Senate to protect our broader national interests against mass sentiment & momentary passions. That kind of Senate is no more. Instead of protecting us from a mass sentiment of anger & tribalism, the modern Senate has become its most powerful showcase.

This process has left the American people with more questions than answers. This has not been a search for the truth. http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1048324927735173121/pu/img/9XGgNsClVXU4_wA_.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1048324927735173121/pu/vid/320x180/9LWHcy6uAWtWnQ43.mp4?tag=5

Please don’t forget this: your work matters; your stories matter; you matter. We cannot and we will not give up. —NP

Most will never know the full extent of the efforts to intimidate & threaten @SenatorCollins on the #Kavanaugh vote. I am not talking about political pressure or people screaming at her in an elevator. I am talking about vicious, vile & dangerous actions. She is legit. https://twitter.com/senatorcollins/status/1048314564826292227 QT @SenatorCollins My full statement on my decision to support Judge Brett Kavanaugh's nomination to be an associate justice on the U.S. Supreme Court: https://www.collins.senate.gov/newsroom/senator-collins-announces-she-will-vote-confirm-judge-kavanaugh

"They did not interview Dr. Ford at all. They did not give her the ability to speak her truth during this so-called investigation."

RT @SenBooker The Senate just voted 51-49 to advance the nomination of Brett Kavanaugh – but the FINAL vote is tomorrow. There is still time to change the minds of some Senators. 202 224 3121. Please call. Please.

This hurts. But even the fights we lose matter. Every time you called, and marched, and tweeted, you helped move us closer. And it was so close. 

It’s ok to step back for a minute and take a breath. But you cannot give up. We still need you in this.

To all the survivors who are hurting right now: do not lose hope. Your stories, your pain have shaken a nation awake, and this fight has not been in vain. 

This will not be how the story ends.
#BelieveSurvivors http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DoxbILkXsAAjLPA.jpg

“We want a fair system. We want a just system. We want a system that recognizes the rule of law. There are countries that are rule by mob, rule by accusation, rule by insinuation, but we need a process. In this case we have gone through a process that was designed to be fair. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DoynM82XkAAPY4I.jpg
BREAKING: There are now 30 hours until a final vote on Judge Kavanaugh’s nomination to the Supreme Court. Don’t stop calling your senators and telling them to vote NO. Keep up the fight.

32 days. That's all that separates us from Election Day.

We need you ALL IN over the next 32 days so we can keep Texas red, free, and prosperous.

Judge Kavanaugh is not worthy of joining the Supreme Court.

- He will become a part of the hard-right majority on the Supreme Court
- There are very credible allegations of sexual assault against him
- He lied to Congress

It doesn’t matter your race, age, gender, income — sexual assault affects everyone. This is a conversation we need to keep having and we need to take seriously.

Let’s show Senate Republicans that the people in power are no match for the power of the people. Let’s keep showing up. Let’s keep speaking out. Call. Write. Join a protest. Call some more: (202) 224-3121.

63% of sexual assaults are not reported to the police in our country. Many go unreported. Some don't tell anyone. This is an issue that impacts so many Americans. Dr. Ford's experience is no different than the majority of sexual assault victims.
LIVE NOW! Tune in to @FoxNews to catch my live interview with @seanhannity! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DoycEI-WwAA-u_Q.jpg
To all survivors of sexual assault: We hear you. We see you. We will give you dignity. Don't let this process bully you into silence.

This was not a search for the truth. According to media reports, more than 40 people are willing to share their information about Kavanaugh and Dr. Ford. They only interviewed nine. This is a travesty.

We face defeat

But we are not defeated. 

Knocked down

But not knocked out. 

A loss 

But all is not lost. 

Hope is the active conviction that despair will not ever have the last word. 

#Midterms

Red Tide was confirmed in #MiamiDade county yesterday. This is a statewide crisis for Florida. My priority for the state is Everglades restoration and for passage of #WRDA in the Senate next week. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1048216524912316416/img/fjXXpgJs2XQRdxcg.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1048216524912316416/vid/320x180/UnmDl80MSCLXpiOv.mp4?tag=8

This morning, the Senate will vote on whether to move Judge Kavanaugh’s nomination forward. I will vote NO.

I want to thank my wife @janeosanders for standing in for me this morning at the Williston Central School Candidate Forum in Vermont while I was in the Senate. I look forward to meeting the students who asked so many great questions.

Pleased that @POTUS signed the Anti-Terrorism Clarification Act of 2018 into law. This new and much-needed law will help Floridians and other Americans who are victims of terrorism internationally in their efforts to seek justice in federal courts. https://www.rubio.senate.gov/public/index.cfm?p=Press-Releases&id=13F21332-F296-4BA1-899F-9792D48FE761

Ayer en el condado de #MiamiDade fue confirmada la llegada de la Marea Roja, una crisis a nivel estatal para toda la Florida. My Kavanaugh vote based on facts we have about specific allegations in this specific case.  After 7 background checks with over 150 people interviewed over 2 decades by FBI & not one of them has knowledge of him sexually assaulting anyone. My speech here: https://youtu.be/S-iCe9NteXw
"Media outlets have reported there are more than 40 people with potential relevant info who were willing to share information. Only 9 have been interviewed. This is a travesty."
